00020 /* -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 //  _     _   _
00022 //  | |__ | |_| |_ _ __
00023 //  | '_ \| __| __| '_ \

00029 // HTTP message handler
00030 //
00031 // The status code is a three-digit integer, and the first digit identifies the general category of response:
00032 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 
00034 // 1xx indicates an informational message only
00035 #define HTTP_CONTINUE            100
00036 #define HTTP_SWITCH_PROT                        101
00037 
00038 // 2xx indicates success of some kind
00039 #define HTTP_OK                  200
00040 #define HTTP_CREATED             201
00041 #define HTTP_ACCEPTED            202
00042 #define HTTP_NOT_AUTHORITATIVE   203
00043 #define HTTP_NO_CONTENT          204
00044 #define HTTP_RESET               205
00045 #define HTTP_PARTIAL             206
00046 
00047 // 3xx redirects the client to another URL
00048 #define HTTP_MULT_CHOICE         300
00049 #define HTTP_MOVED_PERM          301
00050 #define HTTP_MOVED_TEMP          302
00051 #define HTTP_SEE_OTHER           303
00052 #define HTTP_NOT_MODIFIED        304
00053 #define HTTP_USE_PROXY           305
00054 
00055 // 4xx indicates an error on the client's part
00056 #define HTTP_BAD_REQUEST         400
00057 #define HTTP_UNAUTHORIZED        401
00058 #define HTTP_PAYMENT_REQUIRED    402
00059 #define HTTP_FORBIDDEN           403
00060 #define HTTP_NOT_FOUND           404
00061 #define HTTP_BAD_METHOD          405
00062 #define HTTP_NOT_ACCEPTABLE      406
00063 #define HTTP_PROXY_AUTH          407
00064 #define HTTP_CLIENT_TIMEOUT      408
00065 #define HTTP_CONFLICT            409
00066 #define HTTP_GONE                410
00067 #define HTTP_LENGTH_REQUIRED     411
00068 #define HTTP_PRECON_FAILED       412
00069 #define HTTP_ENTITY_TOO_LARGE    413
00070 #define HTTP_REQ_TOO_LONG        414
00071 #define HTTP_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE    415
00072 #define HTTP_REQ_RANGE_NOT_OK    416
00073 #define HTTP_EXPECTATION_FAILED  417
00074 
00075 // 5xx indicates an error on the server's part
00076 #define HTTP_INTERNAL_ERROR      500
00077 #define HTTP_NOT_IMPLEMENTED     501
00078 #define HTTP_BAD_GATEWAY         502
00079 #define HTTP_UNAVAILABLE         503
00080 #define HTTP_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT     504
00081 #define HTTP_VERSION             505
00082 
00083 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // HTTP header representation
00085 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 
00087 typedef struct uhttpheader {
00088         const char* method;
00089         const char* uri;
00090         const char*     query;
00091         const char*     host;
00092         uint32_t nResponseCode, version,
00093                                 startHeader, endHeader, szHeader,
00094                                 method_len, uri_len, query_len, host_len,
00095                                 method_type, clength, keep_alive, is_connection_close, is_php;
00096 } uhttpheader;
00097 
00098 enum HTTPMethodType { HTTP_POST = 1, HTTP_GET = 2, HTTP_HEAD = 3 };
00099 
00100 #define U_HTTP_HEADER(str)      str.substr(UHTTP::http_info.startHeader, UHTTP::http_info.szHeader)
00101 
00102 // NB: we check for pointer or offset...
00103 
00104 #define U_HTTP_URI      (UHTTP::http_info.uri   > (const char*)0x0fff ? UHTTP::http_info.uri \
00105                                                                                                                                          : UHTTP::http_info.method + (ptrdiff_t)UHTTP::http_info.uri)
00106 #define U_HTTP_QUERY    (UHTTP::http_info.query > (const char*)0xffff ? UHTTP::http_info.query \
00107                                                                                                                                          : UHTTP::http_info.method + (ptrdiff_t)UHTTP::http_info.query)
00108 
00109 #define U_HTTP_METHOD_TO_PARAM          UHTTP::http_info.method, UHTTP::http_info.method_len
00110 #define U_HTTP_METHOD_TO_TRACE          UHTTP::http_info.method_len, UHTTP::http_info.method
00111 
00112 #define U_HTTP_URI_TO_PARAM                     U_HTTP_URI, UHTTP::http_info.uri_len
00113 #define U_HTTP_URI_TO_TRACE                     UHTTP::http_info.uri_len, U_HTTP_URI
00114 
00115 #define U_HTTP_QUERY_TO_PARAM                   U_HTTP_QUERY, UHTTP::http_info.query_len
00116 #define U_HTTP_QUERY_TO_TRACE                   UHTTP::http_info.query_len, U_HTTP_QUERY
00117 
00118 #define U_HTTP_URI_QUERY_TO_PARAM       U_HTTP_URI, (UHTTP::http_info.uri_len + UHTTP::http_info.query_len + (UHTTP::http_info.query_len ? 1 : 0))
00119 #define U_HTTP_URI_QUERY_TO_TRACE       (UHTTP::http_info.uri_len + UHTTP::http_info.query_len + (UHTTP::http_info.query_len ? 1 : 0)), U_HTTP_URI
00120 
00121 #define U_HTTP_HOST_TO_PARAM                    UHTTP::http_info.host, UHTTP::http_info.host_len
00122 #define U_HTTP_HOST_TO_TRACE                    UHTTP::http_info.host_len, UHTTP::http_info.host
00123 
00124 #define U_HTTP_URI_TO_PARAM_SHIFT(n) U_HTTP_URI+U_min(n,UHTTP::http_info.uri_len), UHTTP::http_info.uri_len-U_min(n,UHTTP::http_info.uri_len)
00125 
00126 // HTTP Compare
00127 
00128 #define U_HTTP_URI_STRNEQ(str)  (strncmp(U_HTTP_URI,                              str, U_max(U_CONSTANT_SIZE(str), UHTTP::http_info.uri_len))    == 0)
00129 #define U_HTTP_HOST_STRNEQ(str) (strncmp(UHTTP::http_info.host, str, U_max(U_CONSTANT_SIZE(str), UHTTP::http_info.host_len))  == 0)
00130 #define U_HTTP_QUERY_STRNEQ(str)        (strncmp(U_HTTP_QUERY,                    str, U_max(U_CONSTANT_SIZE(str), UHTTP::http_info.query_len)) == 0)
00131

00133 
00134 #define U_HTTP_REALM "Protected Area"

00154         static const UString* str_frm_forbidden;

00156         static const UString* str_frm_moved_temp;

00165         static const char* ptrT; // "Content-Type"
00166         static uhttpheader http_info;
00167 
00168         static void setHTTPMethod(const char* method, uint32_t method_len)
00169                 {
00170                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::setHTTPMethod(%.*S,%u)", method_len, method, method_len)
00171 
00172                 http_info.method                = method;
00173                 http_info.method_len = method_len;
00174 
00175                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("method = %.*S", U_HTTP_METHOD_TO_TRACE)
00176                 }
00177 
00178         static void setHTTPMethodType(char c)
00179                 {
00180                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::setHTTPMethodType(%C)", c)
00181 
00182                 if      (c == 'G') // GET
00183                         {
00184                         http_info.method_type = HTTP_GET;
00185 
00186                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(http_info.method_len, 3)
00187                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(U_STRNEQ(http_info.method, "GET"))
00188                         }
00189                 else if (c == 'P') // POST
00190                         {
00191                         http_info.method_type = HTTP_POST;
00192 
00193                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(http_info.method_len, 4)
00194                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(U_STRNEQ(http_info.method, "POST"))
00195                         }
00196                 else // HEAD
00197                         {
00198                         http_info.method_type = HTTP_HEAD;
00199 
00200                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(http_info.method_len, 4)
00201                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(U_STRNEQ(http_info.method, "HEAD"))
00202                         }
00203 
00204                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("method_type = %u", http_info.method_type)
00205                 }
00206 
00207         static UString getHTTPMethod()
00208                 {
00209                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::getHTTPMethod()")
00210 
00211                 if (http_info.method_len)
00212                         {
00213                         UString method((void*)http_info.method, http_info.method_len);
00214 
00215                         U_RETURN_STRING(method);
00216                         }
00217 
00218                 U_RETURN_STRING(UString::getStringNull());
00219                 }
00220 
00221         static void setHTTPUri(const char* uri, uint32_t uri_len)
00222                 {
00223                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::setHTTPUri(%.*S,%u)", uri_len, uri, uri_len)
00224 
00225                 http_info.uri           = uri;
00226                 http_info.uri_len       = uri_len;
00227 
00228                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("uri = %.*S", U_HTTP_URI_TO_TRACE)
00229                 }
00230 
00231         static void setHTTPQuery(const char* query, uint32_t query_len)
00232                 {
00233                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::setHTTPQuery(%.*S,%u)", query_len, query, query_len)
00234 
00235                 http_info.query   = query;
00236                 http_info.query_len = query_len;
00237 
00238                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("query = %.*S", U_HTTP_QUERY_TO_TRACE)
00239                 }
00240 
00241         static void resetHTTPInfo()
00242                 {
00243                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::resetHTTPInfo()")
00244 
00245                 cgi_dir[0] = '\0';
00246 
00247                 (void) U_SYSCALL(memset, "%p,%d,%u", &http_info, 0, sizeof(uhttpheader));
00248                 }
00249 
00250         static void setHTTPInfo(const char* method, uint32_t method_len, const char* uri, uint32_t uri_len)
00251                 {
00252                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::setHTTPInfo(%.*S,%u,%.*S,%u)", method_len, method, method_len, uri_len, uri, uri_len)
00253 
00254                 resetHTTPInfo();
00255 
00256                 setHTTPMethod(           method, method_len);
00257                 setHTTPMethodType(*method);
00258                 setHTTPUri(                              uri,           uri_len);
00259                 setHTTPQuery(                           0,                              0);
00260                 }
00261 
00262         static void getHTTPInfo(const UString& request, UString& method,                  UString& uri);
00263         static void setHTTPInfo(                                                const UString& method, const UString& uri)
00264                 { setHTTPInfo(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(method), U_STRING_TO_PARAM(uri)); }

00276         // TYPE
00277 
00278         static bool isHTTPRequest() { return (http_info.method_type && http_info.szHeader); }
00279 
00280         static bool isHttpGET()
00281                 {
00282                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isHttpGET()")
00283 
00284                 bool result = (http_info.method_type >= HTTP_GET);
00285 
00286                 U_RETURN(result);
00287                 }
00288 
00289         static bool isHttpHEAD()
00290                 {
00291                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isHttpHEAD()")
00292 
00293                 bool result = (http_info.method_type == HTTP_HEAD);
00294 
00295                 U_RETURN(result);
00296                 }
00297 
00298         static bool isHttpPOST()
00299                 {
00300                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isHttpPOST()")
00301 
00302                 bool result = (http_info.method_type == HTTP_POST);
00303 
00304                 U_RETURN(result);
00305                 }
00306 
00307         static bool isSOAPRequest()
00308                 {
00309                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isSOAPRequest()")
00310 
00311                 U_ASSERT(isHttpPOST())
00312 
00313                 bool result = U_HTTP_URI_STRNEQ("/soap");
00314 
00315                 U_RETURN(result);
00316                 }
00317 
00318         static bool isTSARequest()
00319                 {
00320                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isTSARequest()")
00321 
00322                 U_ASSERT(isHttpPOST())
00323 
00324                 bool result = U_HTTP_URI_STRNEQ("/tsa");
00325 
00326                 U_RETURN(result);
00327                 }
00328 
00329         static bool isHTTPDirectoryRequest()
00330                 {
00331                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isHTTPDirectoryRequest()")
00332 
00333                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isHTTPRequest())
00334 
00335                 bool result = (U_HTTP_URI[UHTTP::http_info.uri_len - 1] == '/');
00336 
00337                 U_RETURN(result);
00338                 }
00339 
00340         static bool isUSPRequest()
00341                 {
00342                 U_TRACE(0, "UHTTP::isUSPRequest()")
00343 
00344                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isHTTPRequest())
00345 
00346                 bool result = (U_STRNEQ(U_HTTP_URI, "/usp/") &&
00347                                                         u_endsWith(U_HTTP_URI_TO_PARAM, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM(".usp")));
00348 
00349                 U_RETURN(result);
00350                 }

00377         // param: "[ data expire path domain secure HttpOnly ]"
00378         // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00379         // string -- Data to put into the cookie                        -- must
00380         // int   -- Lifetime of the cookie in HOURS             -- must (0 -> valid until browser exit)
00381         // string -- Path where the cookie can be used  --  opt
00382         // string -- Domain which can read the cookie   --  opt
00383         // bool  -- Secure mode                                                         --  opt
00384         // bool  -- Only allow HTTP usage                                       --  opt
00385         // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00386         // RET: Set-Cookie: ulib_sid=data&expire&HMAC-MD5(data&expire); expires=expire(GMT); path=path; domain=domain; secure; HttpOnly
